dc_creator_sm: San Mateo County, Information Services Department (ISD), County GIS Lead
dc_description_s:
This data layer portrays the tax parcel boundaries in San Mateo County. Lynx
        Technologies, Inc. compiled this data layer in 2000-2001. Lynx compiled the parcel layer
        from County AutoCAD drawings and Fire Run maps as well as electronic data supplied by Cities
        within the County. The final parcel layer was adjusted to best fit the County’s
        200-scale orthophotography base. APN attribution is derived from data within the
        Assessor’s database. Farallon Geographics converted all data from ARC/Info coverages
        into Oracle Spatial. San Mateo County Assessor Department currently maintains the Parcel
        layer.
dc_title_s: San Mateo County, California land and water parcels, 2009
